Package net.mtrop.doom.map.data

Class HexenThing

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mtrop.doom.map.data.HexenThing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryObject
    public class HexenThing
extends Object
implements BinaryObject
    Hexen 20-byte format implementation of Thing.
    Author:
    Matthew Tropiano
